comments.content: I need to know what font is this please. Thank you very much for your help

Not sure what the original font is called (or even if it indeed has a standardized version), but [this blogger](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725141825/http:/switchimageproject.blogspot.com/2013/12/font-and-logo-germany-world-cup-1994.html) seems to be working on digitizing versions of it from football jerseys in the 90's. More links [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725141825/http:/switchimageproject.blogspot.com/2013/11/puma-90s-3d-font.html) and [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725141825/http:/switchimageproject.blogspot.com/2013/12/font-borussia-dortmund-90s.html)...
Don't know the original name either. Another digitization: [Libero](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725141825/http:/typefacts.com/libero)
Exactly, is a football shirt 90s. Thank you for the information, I have been very useful. I am enormously grateful.
